title: Bug 23935: Text widget with Tree parent does not lose focus
description: Both the Text widget and the Tree widget are children of the shell. The issue is observed on Windows only. One possible workaround is to create the text editor as a sibling of the tree and move it above the tree.
OB: When clicking anywhere in the tree, the tree does not lose focus.
EB: In build 20020920, running the attached code, the left tree and text should behave as they should on Windows and Linux.
SR: To reproduce the issue, click anywhere in the tree widget.
